name: Nudge Corner Radius
description: Change the corner radius of a shape through quick keyboard shortcuts
author: David Williames

commands.name: Increase corner radius
commands.description: Increase the corner radius of selected layers.

commands.description: Increase the corner radius of selected layers.

commands.name: Decrease corner radius
